sentences.english: Several ocean-going ships are being laid down here.
sentences.chinese: 这里正在建造几艘远洋货轮。

sentences.english: The era when foreign goods flooded the Chinese market is gone for ever.
sentences.chinese: 洋货充斥中国市场的时代已经一去不复返了。

sentences.english: Ethnographic study in Russia, foreign goods blocked at the gate.
sentences.chinese: 学习俄国民族志，洋货挡在大门口。

sentences.english: A new-type ocean-going freighter is being laid down at that ship yard.
sentences.chinese: 一艘新型的远洋货轮正在那家船厂建造。

sentences.english: Revived handicrafts that have no fear of being beaten down by the influx of machine-made goods from abroad.
sentences.chinese: 因为手工业复兴了，不怕被机制洋货的倾销挤倒了。

sentences.english: They have thrown out a pier to accommodate oceangoing freighters.
sentences.chinese: 他们建成一个凸式码头供停靠远洋货轮使用。

sentences.english: In the past few deccommerciinges foreign goods flooded the markets of the developing countries.
sentences.chinese: 当年的几十年中洋货充塞着成长中国度的市场。

sentences.english: A new-type ocean-going freighter is being laid down at that shipyard.
sentences.chinese: 一艘新型的远洋货轮正在那家船厂建造。

sentences.english: He then opened his bags to prove he had avoided foreign-made goods.
sentences.chinese: 接着他打开购物袋，证明他没买洋货。

sentences.english: In the past few decades foreign goods flooded the markets of the developing countries.
sentences.chinese: 过去的几十年中洋货充斥着发展中国家的市场。

definition: foreign devil/term of abuse for Westerners
online purchase of goods dispatched from overseas
to revere everything foreign and pander to overseas powers (idiom); blind worship of foreign goods and ideas
(derog.) wannabe foreigner, a Chinese person who apes the ways of foreigners
